ygData.subject: RE: Centaur Village Quest Items
ygData.msgSnippet: And this was specifically [Star Ruby] platinum?  Why would, or even *could*, someone use them for jewelry? ... From: Doug Sorensen
ygData.messageBody:
And this was specifically [Star Ruby] platinum? Why would, or even *could*,
someone use them for jewelry?

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Sorensen [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
Sent: Monday, July 19, 1999 5:25 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Centaur Village Quest Items


From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>

Only place you will find them are on mobs or find
someone selling them. I saw a Platinum Star Ruby
Jewelry item sell for about 3000 plat on my server. I
can only imagine how rare they are. I can imagine they
are on the 30+ mobs only too. So you know, I saw a
picture of the crafted breastplate and Warrior is the
only Class that can use it.

Belgarth Wolfstrider

--- Jason Harrell <jharrell@...> wrote:
> From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
>
> Hail All,
>
> As I'm sure many of you are wondering the same
> thing, where do we find the +AFs-Star Rubies+AF0- or
> +AFs-Sapphires+AF0- from the aforementioned quest?
> Any information greatly appreciated.
>
> Trajen D'Fraust
> Barbarian Shaman
> Lord of The Divinity - Order of Deus Vult
